name: Sho
description:
Sho game is specially designed to help learners memorize formulas but it is so fun to play so you won't even notice that. All of the graphics is hand-painted by a talented artist Olha Malko. You have the opportunity to see the world the way Sho sees it: colorful, happy and interesting. The character is based on a tale by this artist. She wrote it because her daughter had been bored with all the other stories and wanted something new. Download the game and start the wonderful trip with Sho right now!
